LanguageData.RGK_Terrain.label: 木製地板
LanguageData.RGK_Terrain.description: 木製地板有種家的溫馨與安逸感。雖然鋪設速度快，但也非常易燃。
LanguageData.GL_Terrain.label: wood floor
LanguageData.GL_Terrain.description: Wood plank flooring for that warm, homey feeling. While it is quick to lay, it is also very flammable.
LanguageData.PebbleSandstone.label: sandstone Pebble
LanguageData.PebbleSandstone.description: The floor is made of gravel.

LanguageData.PebbleGranite.description: The floor is made of gravel.

LanguageData.PebbleLimestone.description: The floor is made of gravel.

LanguageData.PebbleSlate.description: The floor is made of gravel.

LanguageData.PebbleMarble.description: The floor is made of gravel.
